# Copilot Instructions for Student Project Tracking System

This workspace contains a full-stack Student Project Progress & Performance Tracking System with GitHub Integration.

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: React with Vite, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Node.js with Express, JWT authentication
- **Database**: MongoDB with Mongoose
- **APIs**: GitHub API for repository integration

## Key Features
- User roles: Student, Mentor, Admin
- Project management with team assignment
- Task tracking with status updates
- Mentor feedback system
- GitHub repository linking and activity visualization
- Responsive dashboard with modern UI

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern React hooks and functional components
- Implement secure authentication with JWT
- Follow RESTful API design
- Ensure responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Handle errors gracefully on both frontend and backend
- Use environment variables for sensitive data
- Write clean, scalable code with proper separation of concerns

## File Structure
- `client/`: React frontend
- `server/`: Node.js backend with models, routes, middleware
- `.github/`: This instructions file
- `README.md`: Project documentation

When suggesting code changes, ensure compatibility with the existing architecture and maintain security best practices.
